entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:56 a.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 2:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 47 %
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy after midnight with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
